reference.shortdesc: The troubleSolution element contains a possible cause and remedy for the problem described in a troubleshooting topic.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The cause might be omitted if it is implicit or if the remedy is not associated with a cause. The remedy might be omitted if there is no known remedy for the cause.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The troubleSolution element is specialized from bodydiv. It is defined in the troubleshooting module.
